properties.Problem: Bank erosion of the canal.
properties.Recommendation: Earth filling of the canal, turfing and planting vetiver grass with edible plants. Establishing vegetative cover with Areca nut, Beetle creeper plantation

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal towards both sides.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 25 m

properties.Problem: Absence of a canal with proper condition.
properties.Recommendation: Excavation of 300m long canal with 0.3m BW, 1:1.5 SS, 0.45m depth. Earth filling the reservation, turfing and planting with Areca nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Infiltration of canal water into the soil. (L- 200m)
properties.Recommendation: Stream / canal reservation protection by earth filling of strip of 1.5m to 2m wide and average Depth of 0.5m, Turfing to new sloping soil surface (DAD D 01) or planting single row of vetiver grass with eco friendly edible plants

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal towards the field side.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 30 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal towards the field side.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 20m. Protection of the canal with earthwork, turfing and planting Areca nut and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: The capacity of the canal is insufficient and overflow.
properties.Recommendation: Desilting of the canal. Protection of canal by earth filling and planting Areca nut and Beetle Creepers.

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal towards the field side.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 30 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: The canal is overflowing.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 50 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: The capacity of the canal is insufficient and overflow.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 25 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem:
Seepages from the canal towards the field side. (L- 200m)

properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 50 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal towards the field side.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 25 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 25 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal towards the field side.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal towards the field side.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 50 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem:
Seepages from the canal towards the field side.
The wall of the canal is dilapidated. (L- 10m)
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 15 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal towards the field side. (L- 400m)
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem:
Absence of a canal with proper condition.
Water overflows.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 25 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal towards both sides.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: The capacity of the canal is insufficient.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 25 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal towards the field side.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 100 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Seepages from the canal towards the field side.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 30 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: The capacity of the canal is insufficient and overflow.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 50 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Seepages from the concrete lined area of the canal towards the field side.
properties.Recommendation: Cement plastering to prevent leakage in the lining. Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 25 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: Depletion of the canal due to infiltration of water into the soil.
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 25 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers. Construction of 300mm diameter 2.5m long culvert.

properties.Problem: A part of the canal is not concrete lined. (L- 1000m)
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 50 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem: A part of the canal is not concrete lined. (L- 1000m)
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 75 m. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.

properties.Problem:
Seepages from the canal towards the field side. (L- 100m)
Paddy fields go under water for 500 m
properties.Recommendation: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining for 25 m. Cement plastering to prevent leakages. Canal reservation protection by earth filling and planting Arica nut trees and Beetle creepers.
